title: compromised account support?
body: this might be an odd question, but i had amassed about 208,000 ip throughout my years of playing league. and when i logged yesterday, using the same password i always have, all of my ip was gone. in my recent purchases it showed that someone or a technical glitch spent it all on various things that i would never buy.  i made a ticket as soon as i found out last night, and am awaiting response. but what i dont understand, is when i went to view my tickets this morning, there was no ticket there. but i still dont have my IP returned or all the fraudulent purchases refunded, and no emails from riot telling me whats going on. could this be a technical glitch considering password and info are all still the same? should i submit another ticket?

replies.body:
I was able to find your open ticket in our ticket queue, so it was definitely submitted correctly and another ticket is not necessary. I suggest sitting tight until an account specialist is able to get back to you. Response times are a bit longer than normal, but we'll get to you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
